title: Quitting Ranked game forever, I won 8 out of 10 games and back to Bronze 5 from Bronze 2
body:
I spent months and months playing and climbing the system going from Bronze 5 to Bronze 2 and finally happy that my hard work had paid off.  I have played over 500 games in order to get to Bronze 2. I know I'm not the best but I was glad to fit into Bronze 2 and was 1 win away to becoming Bronze 1 finally. 

Now the new season has started, and even though I won 8 out of 10 games. I get placed back into Bronze 5. 

Now I realised Ranked games is not worth it any- more. It is not enjoyable.

replies.body:
Hey there SSH,

I understand how frustrating this can be, however it is normal.

Your current (estimated) MMR is rather high for Bronze 5 (759) If you continue to play and win you have a high chance of skipping a division entirely and moving up to Bronze 3. It really isn't that hard to climb out of "elo hell" as some people call it.

Chin up :D

Hi, thank you for the comments and support. It just that I feel like I have wasted time and effort winning those games for nothing. What if i lost all those 8 games out of 10, will it still be the same result?  as in Bronze 5?  And it also feels like getting to Bronze 2 meant nothing since I have to win those promotional games all over again. But guess this is how Riot games work now, I can't help but feel a little bit cheated. Anyways thank you for the help.
Just climb back again tbh, should be even easier this season. You mmr is more than likely higher than bronze 5 anyway.
